channel.title: Not the Way We Wanted
channel.description: Not the Way We Wanted is an RPG podcast where we make and play RPGs, and it doesn't go the way we want.
channel.itunes:subtitle: An RPG podcast
channel.itunes:author: James Allen and Seth Jensen
channel.itunes:summary: Not the Way We Wanted is an RPG podcast where we make and play RPGs, and it doesn't go the way we want.

item.title: Hell's Resource Part 2
item.itunes:title: Hell's Resource Part 2 | NW3 7
item.itunes:author: James Allen and Seth Jensen
item.description:
dark, fiery office
the Brimstone Corporation
welcomes you to Hell

Art by Owen Skinner
Music by Andrew Simmons
